Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Blue Island
ShortDescription: WB 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted WB: 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th; EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 9 buses temp. rerouted NB: 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th; SB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near  95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Southbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
